data.text:
The actor Greg Wise, 48, found fame following his role as Mr Willoughby in Sense and Sensibility, in 1995. He met the actress Emma Thompson on set and the couple were married in 2003. They have a daughter, Gaia, 15, and a grown-up son, Tindy, 28, whom they informally adopted when he was a 16-year-old.

Marriage has taught me kindness. Kindness is more important and more powerful than intellect – often intellect is used as a weapon. Life would be so much more glorious if there were more kindness and less politicking and intellectualising.
